title: Conduct Final Walkthrough with Client
description: The project is substantially complete. The PM needs to conduct the final walkthrough with the client to generate the initial punch list.

tasks.description: Schedule the final walkthrough with the client and architect.
During the walkthrough, use a mobile device to log any defects or incomplete items identified by the client directly into the punch list system.
tasks.expected_outcome: New punch list items are created in real-time during the meeting.
